      Gets the color of the worker positioned in a specific cell
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the cell
      column - The column of the cell
      Returns:
      A string containing the name of the color or null value if the cell is empty

    • getDomeAt

      public boolean getDomeAt​(int row, int column)
      Checks if a specific cell has a dome
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the cell
      column - The column of the cell
      Returns:
      True if the cell has a dome, otherwise false
